direction.raw_text: You know her, probably ran to the hotel gym for a quick work-out. Samantha appears in the doorway wearing a summer coat -- the dog is in her purse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no place like home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweetie! They kiss -- She goes to Miranda; they kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a rat in your purse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that rat better be house trained. A CATER WAITER walks over to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I take your coat? Samantha nods and takes off her coat. Revealing: She has a belly. A very non-Samantha big fat gut. Carrie looks at it. Miranda looks at it. Carrie and Miranda exchange looks. Charlotte comes running down the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Samantha! Samantha raises her arms to greet her. Her blouse rides up, the gut peeks out. Charlotte reacts; shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a -- dog!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you ever think you'd see the day -- me with a pooch. All three shake their heads: No. 216   INT. CARRIE'S APARTMENT/BATHROOM -- LATER -- SPRING       216 Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte are in the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, she has a belly. So what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, a belly on anyone else is a "so what?" A belly on Samantha is a: "So what the hell is going on?"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She never mentioned it on the phone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never. And when has she ever not talked about every detail regarding her body?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should we even bring it up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What -- like a fat intervention? "We love you -- have a salad?" No. We should let her bring it up. There is a knock... Samantha opens the door. She's eating a piece of cake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ladies, we can talk about my gut later-- right now, I'm bored to tears here. She gives them a look. They smile, relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 217   INT. CARRIE'S APARTMENT -- LATER -- SPRING                  217 Everyone has left. Samantha is sitting with Charlotte and Miranda and Carrie. They are having coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I eat -- so I won't cheat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What exactly are you eating?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything except Dante's dick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Language, please -- this is a grown- up apartment now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess I didn't realize how big I was until I saw it on your faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How -- and I say this with love -- How could you not realize it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been avoiding mirrors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm proud of you for not cheating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know if there's anything to be proud of. I stuff my face to stop myself from doing something that feels natural to me. Carrie reaches over and rubs Samantha's back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you say something?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess I didn't want to admit it. And when you're in denial -- you don't dial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, listen -- this isn't about the weight. You'd be gorgeous at any size. But are you happy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Silence; then) Relationships aren't always about being happy, right? (beat) How often do you feel happy in your relationship?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Charlotte) I'm pretty sure that's to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You feel happy ever day?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not all day -- everyday -- but everyday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When was the last time you felt happy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six months ago. They react.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I going to do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does your gut tell you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know but -- (beat; hard) Smith stayed with me through chemo. If he could stay with me through that, I should be able to stay in this relationship for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sweetie... You just compared your relationship to chemo. Samantha looks at her, then Charlotte, then Miranda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There we were...the three mirrors Samantha couldn't avoid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Samantha? Samantha looks. Carrie points. The dog is humping a pillow on Carrie's furniture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That pillow cost three hundred dollars. 218   INT. BEACHHOUSE -- DINING ROOM/SUNSET -- SPRING            218 Samantha is sitting -- waiting. Smith enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey -- You're home! I thought you were staying the week. He kisses her. She looks at him. Touches his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need to talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awwww... man. I knew this was coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. This isn't working. (beat) I've done my best. I've given it five years and fifteen pounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What -- You don't love me any more?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I love you - ah, fuck it -- I'm just gonna say the thing you're not supposed to say -- I love you but I love me more. And I've been in a relationship with myself for forty-nine years and that's the one I need to work on. She stands up and wraps her arms around him, whispers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll find a wonderful woman who loves being in a relationship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What will you find?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. But that's a risk I'm willing to take. She notices the gardenia ring on her finger. She starts to take it off. Stops. Looks back up at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I'm keeping this. Every time I look down at it I want to think of you. She kisses him on the lips. GENTLY. SOFTLY. 219   INT. AIRPLANE/FIRST CLASS -- NIGHT -- SPRING              219 Samantha sits in first class. She is crying... while eating a hot fudge sundae. A STEWARDESS leans down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're landing in new York. I'm gonna need to take that now. Samantha nods, and finishes eating the hot fudge sundae as fast as she can. Scraping, almost licking the bowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As someone returned to my life... 220   INT. CARRIE'S APARTMENT -- DAY -- SPRING                  220 Carrie stands at the door with Louise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Someone left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I put all the unopened mail from your P.O. Box in the manila envelopes on the bottom shelf there. She points to the shelf in the new bookcase. Carrie looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And please -- please do not make a mess of CarrieBradshaw.com -- it's my masterpiece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What am I gonna do without you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll find some other girl... but she won't have my style.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: St. Louise, you brought me back to life. Emotion floods Carrie; she chokes up. So does Louise -- LOUISE And you gave me Louise Vuitton. Carrie laughs -- they hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Serious. We need to stop cryin'. Louise breaks the hug and takes her "love" key chain out of her purse -- hands it to Carrie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your keys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait -- don't forget your "love."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I found my love. I'm leaving that with you. Carrie smiles. Louise starts out the door, turns back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you at my wedding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll meet you in St. Louis. Louise gives one last look, and leaves. Carrie closes the door. Looks down at "love" in her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 221   INT. CARRIE'S APARTMENT -- NIGHT -- SPRING                  221 Carrie is sitting at her desk... typing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, there were no more distractions. (beat) And as I moved on... 222   EXT. MIRANDA'S APARTMENT BUILDING -- DAY -- SPRING          222 Samantha walks past Lovro and Magda sitting on chairs out front, sipping ice tea, and up to Miranda's lower east side apartment stoop with the dog on the leash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Samantha moved in. The HOT TATTOOED LATIN GUY is still sitting on the stoop out front with the ferocious looking pitbull. She starts up the stairs. He checks her out. She turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, I'm your new neighbor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Diego.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Samantha. They smile. There is a connection. Samantha looks down. The dog is humping the pitbull. Diego nods approval. 223   EXT. UPPER EAST SIDE RESTAURANT -- DAY -- SPRING            223 A very, very pregnant Charlotte carrying shopping bags is being seated at a banquette by the HOSTESS (26).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When are you due?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next week.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look gorgeous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, thank-you. The Hostess walks away as Charlotte settles in and looks around. Her eyes WIDEN. Big is sitting across the room at a table -- alone. He hasn't seen her. Charlotte starts to panic as the WAITRESS (20's) comes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, can I -- CHARLOTTE No, I'm sorry -- I can't stay -- Help me -- pull out the table. I can't -- Charlotte pulls herself up off the banquette. As she tries to slide out, her belly and shopping bags knock things off the table. Crash. DINERS looks. Big spots her -- their eyes meet. She moves away as quickly as she can through the room. He gets up and follows after her. 224   EXT. UPPER EAST SIDE RESTAURANT -- DAY -- SPRING            224 Charlotte exits the restaurant -- visibly upset. Big is quickly on her heels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Charlotte. Charlotte wait -- He catches up to her - and gently steps to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're pregnant -- don't run.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to see you. She starts crying and talking though the tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so mad at you. I was always on your side and then you did that to Carrie -- No, no -- I'm not going to cry -- I'm not going to waste tears on you -- (strong; stomping foot) I curse the day you were born! Charlotte's eyes widen. She stops moving, entirely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think my water just broke. (beat) Oh my God -- Taxi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My car's right there. Get in my car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to get in your car -- I hate your car. Taxi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Charlotte -- we need to get you to the hospital -- Please get in my car. It's right here and ready. Charlotte finally nods. Big hurries her to the car. 225   INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR -- LATER                             225 Carrie hurries down a corridor -- looking for a room. She spots it, knocks and enters. 226   INT. HOSPITAL ROOM -- CONTINUOUS                            226 Carrie enters. Harry stands there. Beaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. Congratulations... A girl!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's my lot in life to be surrounded by beautiful women. She kisses him and walks over to the bed where Charlotte is holding ROSE, a beautiful baby with thick dark hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my God. She's gorgeous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say hello to Rose. Carrie kisses Charlotte on the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What a beautiful name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After Harry's "Bubbie."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, we got a Lily and a Rose. Carrie sits on the edge of the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I have to say you two are very cool customers -- just making the "baby's here" call without all the "I'm in labor" drama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh -- there was plenty of drama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My water broke in front of a restaurant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very dramatic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait -- she's not done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It broke while I was talking to Big.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See. Drama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bumped into him and I got so upset I started crying and then - my water broke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He brought her to the hospital. Stayed until the baby was born.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think he was hoping to see you. Silence. Carrie is having a hard time with this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well -- today is not about him. It's about beautiful baby Rose. (beat; forced up) So -- we know she has Charlotte's hair -- what else do we know? Harry and Charlotte give each other a sad glance. 227   INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR -- LATER                           227 Carrie walks out of Charlotte's room with Harry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a doll. Mazel tov! She kisses Harry on the cheek and starts away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He asked me to ask you to call him. Carrie stops. Turns around. Looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know! It's none of my business. But I felt bad for the poor schmuck hanging around the hospital waiting room hoping to see you. I swear every time he heard someone in heels coming down the hall -- his heart stopped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harry -- it's so much more complicated than you can imagine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know it is -- and you have every right to never call him -- but I'm just a big pile of love today --and I feel bad for the guy. He said he's been writing you -- but you never responded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's never written me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said he wrote because he didn't have your phone number.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He's never written me. Ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then, why would he say that he had? Carrie looks at Harry. Lost. Confused. 228   INT. CARRIE'S APARTMENT -- LATER -- SPRING                  228 Carrie enters her apartment. She glances over at her bookcase -- Remembers. JUMP CUT TO: Carrie opens the bookcase drawer and takes out a Manila envelope marked: P.O. Box. JUMP CUT TO: Carrie dumps the contents of the envelopes on the desk. JUMP CUT TO: Carrie quickly sorts through the mail -- looking -- looking for something. A letter -- something. Nothing from him. She leans back in her chair -- more confused. Her eyes drift up to her computer. She wonders if -- JUMP CUT TO: Carrie is logging onto CarrieBradshaw.com. She types in PASSWORD. JUMP CUT TO: CarrieBradshaw.com's "welcome page." She clicks on EMAIL. JUMP CUT TO: Carrie scans through emails -- none are from Big. Frustrated she logs off. 229   INT. CARRIE'S APARTMENT -- LATER                            229 Carrie is still at her desk, lost in thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two hours, two manila envelopes and countless emails later, I was just about to give up on the Big riddle when -- She looks back at her computer screen and notices: "CB-assistant." Carrie sits up. Clicks on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had told Louise to put Big in a place where I would never have to hear from him again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Louise -- it's me. What's the password to get into your assistant file? Call me. She hangs up and places the phone on a pile of mail -- which causes the mail to fall over onto the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit. Carrie reaches down to pick-up the mail -- she notices the "LOVE" key chain has fallen as well. She picks it up and looks at it, has a hunch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my God. JUMP CUT TO: Carrie types the password: "L-O-V-E." Yes! The file opens -- her eyes widen. There on the screen are many, many, many emails -- all from JJP@JJP.com.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As soon as I typed in "love" -- there he was. She clicks on the first e-mail. It opens: It's the love letter from Beethoven, retyped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And because Big still didn't have the words... he retyped a love letter from Beethoven. JUMP CUT TO: New Email: A love letter from Lord Byron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Lord Byron. JUMP CUT TO: New Email: A love letter from James Joyce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And James Joyce. JUMP CUT TO: New Email: A Love letter from Voltaire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Voltaire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JUMP CUT TO: Carrie sits in the chair. Breathless. Overwhelmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There they were. "The Love Letters of Great Men - Volume One." Plus one more... Written by John James Preston. New email -- It reads: "I know I screwed it up -- but I will love you forever." Carrie impulsively picks up the phone -- starts to dial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to call him - but our love... Carrie and Big: volumes one, two, and three... stopped me. She puts the phone down and is about to "delete" the e mail -- suddenly; the phone rings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't hear my phone. 230   INT. BRIDAL SHOP -- CONTINUOUS -- SPRING                   230 Intercut with Louise, standing in a wedding gown. Her MOTHER (45), GRANDMOTHER (65), and SISTERS (20 15, 8) sit watching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are shopping for my wedding gown. ANGELA, her youngest sister calls out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That one makes you look weird.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Momma -- can you please -- This is a work call. The Mother motions for Angela to sit down. She does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's okay I figured it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I was going to call you anyway -- today is the final day on the Fifth Avenue apartment. You have till six before they change the locks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't need to go over there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And do you NOT want those never- worn shoes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh -- I completely forgot about -- LOUISE `Cause if you don't -- send them on to me. I'll squeeze my feet into them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's already five o'clock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello? There are never been worn four hundred dollar shoes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five twenty-five. (beat; hears herself) Bye. Carrie drops the phone and jumps up. 231   EXT. CARRIE'S APARTMENT -- MOMENTS LATER -- SPRING          231 Carrie runs down the stairs... she spots a passing CAB.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Taxi! It SCREECHES to a halt. She runs to the cab. 232   INT. ELEVATOR -- MOMENTS LATER -- SPRING                    232 Carrie steps into the elevator. She presses "PH," steps back. The doors close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 233   INT. PENTHOUSE APARTMENT -- MOMENTS LATER -- SPRING         233 Key in the lock -- Carrie enters. She looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The light in our pre-war apartment looked completely different post- war. 234   INT. PENTHOUSE APARTMENT/BEDROOM -- MOMENTS LATER   -- SPRING 234 Carrie walks into the bedroom and over to the closet. She pushes open the other double door... Revealing -- Mr. Big - standing there holding the Manolos in his hands. He looks up -- surprised by her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was going to get these to you. I didn't want it to be a total loss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't logic -- it was love. She walks into the closet and over to him. She throws her arms around him. He drops the shoes. They kiss. It's passionate. Very -- very passionate. 235   INT. PENTHOUSE APARTMENT/WALK-IN CLOSET -- LATER -- SPRING 35 2 Carrie and Big are nestled up next to each other on the carpeted floor of the empty walk-in closet. His suit jacket is off. Her shoes are off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did we ever decide to get married?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess we were afraid it meant something if we didn't. She looks at him and nods. It's true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry to have done that to you. Silence. She touches his lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry to have done that to you... (beat) And you know the funny part?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there a funny part?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were perfectly happy before we decided to live happily ever after.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep. The jokes on us. She nods... she looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good closet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Comfortable. Is this what you had in mind when you installed the carpet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd like to think I was that smooth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We better get up before the new owner bust in on us. They start to get up. Carrie rises first. He starts to get up, first -- sitting on his side...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the way we decided to get married -- All business... No romance. That's not the way you propose to someone. He moves further up -- onto one knee -- where he stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is. She looks down at him -- Is this happening? He holds out his hand. She places her hand in his.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carrie Bradshaw -- love of my life - - will you marry me? It is everything Carrie Bradshaw had convinced herself would never happen. Could never happen. And here it is. She nods. Speechless. Overcome. He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See, this is why there's a diamond. You need to do something to close the deal. She laughs. He notices her never-worn Manolo on the floor. He picks it up. Holds it out to her. She lifts her foot and places it in the shoe. Cinderella style. 236   INT. COURTHOUSE/ROOM -- DAY -- SPRING                     236 Carrie stands with Big in front of a JUDGE. She is wearing the simple white suit and her never-worn Manolos from the closet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And in the end... Carrie Bradshaw married John James Preston in a label-less dress. Big Smiles. She smiles. Both calm. Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By the power vested in me, by the state of New York, I now pronounce you husband and wife. You may kiss the bride. Big and Carrie kiss. Then, he whispers into her ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ever thine. Ever mine. Ever ours. 237   INT. COURTHOUSE/LOBBY -- LATER                            237 Carrie and Big walk through the courthouse lobby toward the front door holding hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay that it was just us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect. You and me -- like I said.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still. Would have been nice if you had the girls here. He holds the door open for her as they walk outside. 238   EXT. COURTHOUSE -- CONTINUOUS -- SPRING                     238 Carrie and Big walk out of the courthouse into the sun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which is why I called them. Carrie looks. Miranda, Charlotte, and a MORE SLENDER Samantha are standing there. They SCREAM and throw rice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mazel tov! As the rice hits... Carrie screams and Big laughs. A GUARD hurries over to them. Carrie is spitting out rice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me -- excuse me! You're not allowed to throw rice anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, get over it -- It's New York! She winks at the guard. He shrugs and walks away. 239   INT. COFFEE SHOP -- LATER -- SPRING                         239 Big, Carrie, Miranda, Steve, Brady, Charlotte, Harry, Lily, rose, Stanford, Samantha are casually gathered around a couple of tables that have been pushed together. A WAITRESS comes over balancing hot plates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who had the ham and eggs? Big raises his arm. The waitress hands the plate down... Carrie intercepts it and places it in front of Big.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't a fancy designer reception either. Just food and friends. The Waitress hands out the other breakfasts. People LAUGH. Samantha feeds bacon to the dog -- who is wearing a tiny bridal veil on his head. 239A   INT. BARNES AND NOBLE -- DAY -- SUMMER                     239A Carrie's books are displayed on a BOOK KIOSK. Carrie stands in front of it READING to a crowd from the galleys of her new book. She is wearing READING GLASSES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe some labels are best left in the closet... 240    EXT. VITRA -- NIGHT -- SUMMER                               240 Bustling. Carrie, Miranda, Charlotte and Samantha -- back to her fighting weight -- walk down the busy street dressed for a night on the town. They laugh as they go -- their designer purses swinging.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Maybe when we put a label on people... bride, groom, husband, wife, fat, thin, married, single... we forget to look past the label and see the person. They arrive at the club entrance. A line of PEOPLE wait to be let inside. The DOORMAN (30's) spots Carrie, lifts the red rope and lets the girls in -- closing it after them. 241    INT. RESTAURANT -- LATER -- SUMMER                          241 The four girls sit at a table drinking "Cosmopolitans."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmmm. This is delicious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did we ever stop drinking these?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because everyone else started.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sips; then) Well, that is an oldie but goodie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And speaking of an oldie but goodie... A WAITER brings birthday cake to the table. The number: "50" stands proud and tall among the glowing candles. He places it down in front of a proud Samantha.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait -- wait -- a toast. The girls lift their glasses to Samantha.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To Samantha... fifty and fabulous! Samantha smiles, touched -- then blows out her candles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To us... and the next fifty! Miranda, Charlotte and Samantha raise their glasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the next fifty. They sip and look at one another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And there, in the same city where they met as girls, four New York women entered the next phase of their lives... dressed head to toe in love. Samantha licks some icing. Charlotte cuts the cake. Miranda helps. Carrie smiles and sips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's the one label -- that never goes out of style. 242   EXT. VITRA -- CONTINUOUS                                    242 From outside we catch just a glimpse of Carrie and the girls at their table inside the busy club. The CAMERA starts to move away -- passing the line of PEOPLE waiting to get in. At the front of the line four TWENTY-SOMETHING WOMEN stand waiting for the red rope to be lifted. As the CAMERA moves past them and UP -- the Doorman lifts the red rope and the twenty-something women SQUEAL with excitement and anticipation as they hurry inside. The CAMERA continues UP and UP and over the busy and exciting city.
